    Shuyang Sun, 孙书洋

    I am currently a first-year Master of Philosophy (M.Phil.) student at the SIGMA Lab, School of Electrical & Information Engineering, the University of Sydney , supervised by Professor Wanli Ouyang. Before that, I worked for one year as a computer vision researcher at SenseTime, Hong Kong. I received a B.Eng. degree in 2016 in Software Engineering from Wuhan University, China. My research interest is to develop robust and intelligent algorithms related to computer vision and deep learning. You can find my CV here.

    Recent News

    I’m looking for a full-time research intern opportunity in both industry and academia. Feel free to drop me email!

    One paper has been accepted by CVPR 2018. (20 Feb 2018)

    Our paper, Optical Flow Guided Feature, has released on arXiv. (29 Nov 2017)
